function.name: get_current_datetime
function.description: Call this tool after collecting user information and before asking for event details. This tool returns the current date, time and day of the week, which you should use as context to ensure the event start date is in the future and to validate date inputs from the customer.

function.name: get_user_information
function.description: Call this tool at the beginning of the conversation to check if the user exists in the system. This tool automatically identifies the user and returns the user's ID, name, email, and phone number if found. If the user is not found in the system, it will indicate that the user does not exist and you should proceed to collect their information.

messages.content: Sorry, I'm having trouble accessing the system right now.

function.name: save_user_information
function.description: Call this tool after you have collected the user's information when they are not found in the system. This tool saves the new user's information to the database and returns their user ID. Only call this tool after you have gathered the user's name, email, and company name.

company.description: The name of the user's company

messages.content: Sorry, I'm having trouble saving your information right now.

function.name: save_event_details
function.description: Use this tool at the end of the call, once you have collected all the required event details from the customer. This tool saves the complete event information to the database and returns the event ID. Only call this tool after you have gathered all the following information: start date, end date, number of attendees, venue type, location city, location state, minimum budget, and maximum budget. Optional fields like required amenities and additional details can be included if provided by the customer.

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be greater than the current date.

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be greater than or equal to the start date.

number_of_attendees.description: The number of people expected to attend the event

venue_type.description: The type of venue for the event

location_city.description: The city where the event will be hosted

location_state.description: The state where the event will be hosted

budget_min.description: Minimum budget for the event in dollars

budget_max.description: Maximum budget for the event in dollars

required_amenities.description: List of required amenities or accommodations such as parking, catering, AV equipment, accessibility features, etc. (optional)

additional_details.description: Any additional details, special requirements, or preferences for the event (optional)
